aboutUs.title: About us
aboutUs.company_desc: Extras is a private Ukrainian company specializing in translation and visa processing services.
aboutUs.bureau_description: Professional translation of any documents: legal, medical, technical, personal, etc.
aboutUs.motto_description: An approach tailored just for you.
aboutUs.values_description: Honesty, quality, and respect for all.
aboutUs.company_description: The company was registered in 2008 in Kyiv. We are not limited to an office or address. Our services are available to Ukrainians at home and abroad. Founder and CEO Oksana Mudrenok
aboutUs.portfolio_description: - Thousands of translated documents - Over 10 years of experience - Professional team of translators - Confidentiality and security - Affordable prices
